section.title: Leap.Unity.LeapEyeDislocator Class Reference

para.para: Moves the camera to each eye position on pre-render. Only necessary for image pass-through (IR viewer) scenarios.

section.section:
Detailed Description
Moves the camera to each eye position on pre-render. Only necessary for image pass-through (IR viewer) scenarios.
